title: Shark Rocket Ultra-Light Corded Bagless Vacuum for Carpet and Hard Floor Cleaning with Swivel Steering (HV301), Gray/Orange
description: At under 9 lbs., this powerful ultra-lightweight corded stick vacuum handles all floor types and easily converts into a handheld vacuum. It boasts nonstop corded performance for whole-home cleaning from floor to ceiling. Swivel Steering allows for excellent control in tight spaces and additional tools give you the ability to clean in crevices and tackle stubborn pet hair.
